Package controller

package controller
Contains all controller classes implementing business logic for the Internship Placement System.

This package follows the Model-View-Controller (MVC) architecture pattern:

  • Controllers act as intermediaries between View and Model layers
  • Enforce business rules and validation
  • Coordinate data flow between views and models
  • Maintain separation of concerns

Controller hierarchy:

  • BaseUserController - Abstract base class with shared functionality
  • StudentController - Manages student operations (browse, apply, withdraw)
  • StaffController - Manages staff operations (approve internships, review applications)
  • CompanyRepresentativeController - Manages company rep operations (create/edit internships)
  • LoginController - Handles authentication and registration
  • ApplicationController - Manages application CRUD operations
  • InternshipController - Manages internship CRUD operations

Design principles:

  • Single Responsibility: Each controller manages one domain area
  • DRY: Common operations abstracted to BaseUserController
  • Encapsulation: Views never directly access models
Since:
2025-11-16

  • Class
    Description
    ApplicationController
    Controller class that handles all Application-related logic.
    BaseUserController
    Base abstract class for user controllers providing common functionality.
    CompanyRepresentativeController
    Controller for company representative-specific operations.
    InternshipController
    Controller class that handles all Internship-related logic.
    LoginController
    Controller for handling user authentication and registration operations.
    StaffController
    Controller for staff-specific operations.
    StudentController
    Controller for student-specific operations.
    UserController
    Interface defining common operations for all user controllers.
